quote: And then ... perhaps someone will write a book about making a film about a story that is taken from this book which is taken from a real-life story that was copied from a story in a book. You know?
quote_letters: AND THEN PERHAPS SOMEONE WILL WRITE A BOOK ABOUT MAKING A FILM ABOUT A STORY THAT IS TAKEN FROM THIS BOOK WHICH IS TAKEN FROM A REAL-LIFE STORY THAT WAS COPIED FROM A STORY IN A BOOK YOU KNOW
